title: Introduction to Programming
course_details: Learn the fundamentals of programming and coding with this introductory course. Suitable for beginners.

title: Web Development Fundamentals
course_details: Master the basics of web development, including HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, and build your first website.

title: Data Science Essentials
course_details: Explore the world of data science, learn data analysis, and gain insights from data sets.

title: Digital Marketing 101
course_details: Understand digital marketing strategies, SEO, social media, and email marketing.

title: Graphic Design for Beginners
course_details: Start your journey in graphic design, learn Adobe Photoshop, Illustrator, and more.

title: Machine Learning Basics
course_details: Dive into the world of machine learning, understand algorithms, and build predictive models.

title: Business Management Fundamentals
course_details: Develop essential business management skills, from leadership to finance.

title: Language Learning: Spanish
course_details: Begin your journey in learning Spanish, from basic phrases to conversations.

title: Photography Masterclass
course_details: Unlock your photography potential, learn camera settings, composition, and editing.
